title: Xiaomi 13 Pro
description: Xiaomi 13 Pro with a professional system camera leads the master's mobile photography. The AMOLED display is protected from super-smooth scrolling and clarity in daily viewing. The advanced Snapdragon8 Gen2 processor delivers unparalleled performance.

title: Redmi Note 12 Pro
description: Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 Pro also has a reliable triple camera. The system is based on the MediaTek Dimensity 1080 (6nm) processor, which has an AnTuTu (v9) score of 538000. The smartphone has an audio jack and a 5000mAh battery with 67W fast charging.

title: POCO Ð¥5 5G
description: POCO X5 sets new standards in performance and comfort. 5G communication provides unparalleled speed of data exchange. The 6.67-inch FHD+ AMOLED display with blue light protection and 120Hz refresh rate provides a great viewing experience. The 48 MP triple camera captures clear and detailed photos under any conditions.
